Increases the attack damage of this Monster by a given amount.

Increase the points of this player by a given amount.
inputDays() - Method in class main.ui.CommandLineUI
Asks the user for the amount of days they want the game to run for through the standard input, reads the user input and returns the amount of days.
inputName() - Method in class main.ui.CommandLineUI
Asks for a user name from the user through the standard input and reads the user input and returns the user name.
InventoryPanelControl - Class in main.ui.gui
This class implements a controller for a JPanel that shows the main inventory screen for the game GUI.
InventoryPanelControl(GraphicalUI) - Constructor for class main.ui.gui.InventoryPanelControl
The constructor that takes in the GraphicalUI class and sets up a new JPanel for viewing the inventory.
Item - Interface in main.item
This interface defines the functionality required for the items to be used correctly by the wider project.
ItemHeal - Class in main.item
This class implements an ItemHeal which can be used as an item by the player to heal their Monsters.
ItemHeal() - Constructor for class main.item.ItemHeal
The default constructor for an ItemHeal.
ItemIncHealSpd - Class in main.item
This class implements a ItemIncHealSpd which can be used as an item by the player to increase a Monster's current Heal Amount.
ItemIncHealSpd() - Constructor for class main.item.ItemIncHealSpd
The default constructor for an ItemIncHealSpd.
ItemIncMaxHP - Class in main.item
This class implements an ItemIncMaxHP which can be used as an item by the player to increase a Monster's maximum health by a determined amount.
ItemIncMaxHP() - Constructor for class main.item.ItemIncMaxHP
The default constructor for an ItemIncMaxHP.
ItemIncreaseAttack - Class in main.item
This class implements an ItemIncreaseAttack which can be used as an item by the player to increase the attack of their Monsters.
ItemIncreaseAttack() - Constructor for class main.item.ItemIncreaseAttack
The default constructor for an ItemIncreaseAttack.
itemNameList(ArrayList<Item>) - Method in class main.ui.gui.GraphicalUI
Converts an ArrayList of items into an array of the Item's names.
itemShop() - Method in class main.ui.CommandLineUI
Asks the user to input the Id of the item they wish to buy.
itemsString() - Method in class main.player.Player
Returns the items of this player as a string with the indexes of the item.
